name: prepare log entry
prepare log entry
check
prepare log entry
prepare log entry
prepare login request
prepare reminder request
prepare logout request
prepare reminder response
save input to context
prepare startup request
iCloud login
info:
-prepares the message for logging in to the iCloud account
-sends the login message to the iCloud service

name: iCloud startup
info:
-prepares the message for retrieving values from the iCloud account, e.g.
 the names und guids of the existing reminder lists
-sends the startup message to the iCloud service

name: iCloud create
info:
-prepares the message to create a date and/or geofence reminder
-sends the creation message to the iCloud service

name: output
info:
-prepares the output of the service
-currently, the result of the last operation is returned

name: input
info:
-receives the input message and does some validation

The following message is an example for an input message.

{
"appleId":"",
"password":"",
"reminderList":"Reminders",
"priority":1,
"title":"Get a birthday present for Lisa",
"description":"Call Robert to ask what Lisa likes.",
"proximity":"ARRIVE",
"address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL",
"locationName":"Harrods",
"latitude":"51.4992917",
"longitude":"-0.162811",
"alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00"
}

name: save Nominatim response
call Nominatim
info: -calls Nominatim to determine the address for a given geoposition

/* determines the time zone name for a given country code and GMT offset */
function timezonename(countryCode, gmt) {
    var left = 0;
    var right = codes.length - 1;
    var k;
    var code;
    var searchString = countryCode + "_" + gmt;

    while (left <= right) {
        k = Math.round(left + ((right - left) / 2));
        code = codes[k];

        code_0 = code[0].split(";")[0];

        if (searchString.localeCompare(code_0) < 0) {
            right = k - 1;
        } else if (searchString.localeCompare(code_0) === 0) {
            /* found entry */
            return code[0].split(";")[1];
        } else {
            left = k + 1;
        }
    }
    
    /* return as default */
    return "Europe/London";
}

var startupRequest = msg;

startupRequest.req = msg.req;
startupRequest.res = msg.res;

flow.set("usertz", timezonename(msg.payload.requestInfo.country,
                                msg.payload.requestInfo.timeZone));

return startupRequest;

name: version 1.1
info:
version 1.0: initial version
version 1.1: added mapping for time zone names, added exception handling
